title: Implement Nacre MVP
description: Develop a local-first web interface for Beads using Rust (Axum), Askama templates, and HTMX/Vanilla JS for a single-binary distribution.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Users can manage issues via Web UI\n- [ ] UI updates in real-time\n- [ ] Keyboard navigation is functional

title: Setup Rust Web Server
description: Initialize Axum project with Askama for templates. Ensure single binary compilation.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Axum server starts\n- [ ] Askama templates render\n- [ ] Binary includes all assets

title: Implement Beads Data Layer
description: Rust module to interface with Beads SQLite DB or CLI.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Can read issues from .beads\n- [ ] Can update issue status

title: Implement Real-time Infrastructure
description: File watching via 'notify' crate and SSE endpoint for client updates.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Server detects DB changes\n- [ ] Clients receive events via SSE
close_reason: Removed from scope per user request

title: Implement Base UI & Navigation
description: Shared layout and navigation between Main List, Swimlane, and Metrics views.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Shared layout implemented\n- [ ] Navigation menu functional

title: Implement Main List View
description: Single view organizing tickets by Epics (including unassigned). Supports filtering by Status (Open, In Progress), Assignee, and other fields.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Group tickets by Epic\n- [ ] 'No Epic' section\n- [ ] Filters: Status, Assignee, Arbitrary fields

title: Implement Metrics & Timeline View
description: View showing ticket creation statistics and DORA metrics derived from data.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Ticket creation timeline\n- [ ] DORA metrics (Deployment Frequency, Lead Time, etc.)

title: Apply Design System
description: Apply visual design (to be provided) to templates.
